Let’s get it done.
This isn’t about cutting corners — it’s about cutting delays that don’t make housing safer, just slower and more expensive.

My bill creates a narrow exemption from federal NEPA review for infill affordable housing developments that meet strict environmental and site criteria.

It’s a practical way to remove roadblocks while still protecting what matters.

That means higher costs, stalled construction, and fewer homes when we need them most.
